name: Original Childrens Room Art, Cartoons, etc.
description:
Custom, original, illustrations for your babies and children rooms; or for the adults in your life with a wonderful sense of humor.  I draw anything you can think of:  Animals, objects, people, whatever you want, you request, I do. See Example.

(Matte & Frame not included.)

Available to order:
Technical ink and marker cartoon illustrations for yourself, your baby or childrens room(s), or for gifts for your friends who have a sense of humor.

Two sizes available:
12.5" x 12.5"
12.5" x 19"

Children Cartoon Art, and Personal Requests, take 2-4 weeks for turnaround & delivery.  Rush orders for gifts are accepted, fees apply, and are determined based on the request.

This is the cover illustration of the story of "Mister Meerasaké," an ad firm owner by day, macaque owning mob boss by night.  An adult's children's book of this story and matching illustrations will be available at some point.

Expect 5-10 business days for delivery

Thank you,

The original technical ink illustration is not for sale at the current time.

AW

name: SALE:  $20 OFF - Margot & The Nuclear So and So's - Rot Gut (Signed By Band)
description:
$20.00 OFF Sale Coupon Code to Enter When Ordering.
Limited Codes Exist.
Use this coupon code below to discount $20 off of $65 for a total of $45 before S&H is applied during check-out!

Coupon Code:  MARGOTROTGUT

This is a collage of illustrations produced and featured throughout the vinyl and CD released of Margot and The Nuclear So and So's 2012 full length release, "Rot Gut, Domestic".  Every archival ink print is signed by each band member, original individual signatures, not printed-they signed each one for me back in late March.

The original ink illustrations are for sale, too, and all have the band members original signatures on them–but a few sold earlier this year, or were given to private collections for personal reasons; also, the few originals that haven't sold are priced to keep, just a heads up on cost.  Here's a link to all the Margot Rot gut artwork related items, prints and original illustrations:

http://andywhorehall.bigcartel.com/artist/margot-the-nuclear-so-and-so-s


____________________________
Limited 1st Ed. Run of Prints 
> 12.5" x 19"
> Signed & numbered by the artist along with each band member's original signature (not printed signatures, as some have asked!!)
> 1c Black Ink on 80# / 100% Recycled Bright White Classic Columns
> QTY: 50 - All signed individually, each band member - Once they're gone, that's it.
> Shipped rolled, sealed, and insured in a heavy-duty 3" x 3" x 16" poster tube.
Expect 5-10 business days for delivery.

Thank you!
AW  |  dD

Feel free to contact me with a higher offer if you see fit.  : )

name: IT’S A PENIS AND A VAGINA OR MOST OF THE TEACHERS I'VE HAD IN LIFE WERE CULTURELESS HACKS
description:
This will look great on the right person's wall.  Typically a person who enjoys finding no deeper meanings in looking at fine art.  Particulary the 100+ teachers I've had in life who said, "you can't do that," and "why would you think that?," and "No. What's wrong with you?"  I can't remember their names because they were horrible, cultureless individuals who some how earned the right to influence the youth at an impressionable age.  This is for them.  (Thank you to the 4 teachers whose names I still remember.) 

Graphite & Charcoal
Original
1995 (I think, or 1994, can't remember.)

Ships flat and insured
$35 - USA
$70 - Everywhere else

Expect 10-15 business days for S&H, plus delivery
Matting and framing available, additional fees will apply, contact me:
andy (at) andywhorehall dot com

NOTE:  Original illustrations contain working flaws, creases, the dirt. This is one of my babies, the price is no coincidence; it's matched with the same year Columbus f'ed everything up for the Native Americans– so I won't be letting go of this easily, nor am I willing to negotiate a cheaper price.  Feel free to contact me with a higher offer if you see fit because as I see it, it's worth 14 times the amount I'm selling it for and when I die it will be worth 1492 times more than what it's selling for now while I am alive and healthy.  Minions, all of you.  You know I'm right, I always am.

name: $20 OFF SALE:  Lord Thomas Derby | My God, The Heat (Limited, Only 6 Available)
description:
$20 off the first 3 orders. Only 6 prints exist.
There are only 3 sale coupon codes available to use, apply it during check out.  Use this coupon code:
MYGODLORDDERBY

12.5 x 19" on white linen. Signed & numbered by Andy Whorehall. This is a limited ed. run of 6 prints.

NOTE:  A limited run of "Lord Derby" was licensed to My God, The Heat (Rockford, IL) to produce a run of their own as a reward tier for their successful Kickstarter campaign upon the release of their debut record, "Beautiful Men in an Ugly Town".  A few exist still at their online store if you wish to spend a little less.  What are the differences you wonder? I use a slightly larger linen paper with archival ink.  Reasons to buy from them:  They're autographed by the entire band!  Reasons to buy from me: None whatsoever aside from the fact I created each one with orange blood and a white dot, or you simply prefer your Lord Derby a little larger. That's what she said. 

Limited Archival Ink Print:
     12.5" x 19" 
     Qty: Only 6 Available
     Signed by artist & numbered
     Shipped rolled, sealed, and insured
     Expect 5-10 business days for delivery

"Lord Thomas Derby" is the proud executive producer of My God, The Heat's debut record, "Beautiful Men in an Ugly Town".  A limited first run edition of 12 x 18 screen prints were auctioned off by the band via their successful kickstarter campaign.  Lord Thomas Derby is the C.E.O. and LORD of all in the YOU$A™.

More info about Lord Thomas Derby can be discovered in Andy Whorehall's rabbit hole.  

Start here on iTunes:
https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/songs-about-stuff-and-things/id500587157?mt=2

And end up here at Lord Derby's company website:
http://derbyreynolds.com

name: Custom Order Mini-Illustrations with Frame Card
description:
2.5" x 3.5" Cards with Envelopes  |  Anything you can think of, you tell me, I draw it- my way for you.  Every mini-illustration is an original. If you want me to draw you an apple or a talking cookie, done. 

4 for $75.00 <<< or >>> 1 for $35.00.
You do the math!

> Every illustration is different and produced per order.
> 1c Technical Black Ink on 2.5" x 3.5" Strathmore Illustration Boards with Matching Envelope. Occassionally I add some color or metallic inks to the mini illustrations.  Depends on whether or not I feel it needs it : ) which makes every mini illustration unique.
> Expected Delivery is 10 business days.
> Each Mini-Illustration is Signed & Sealed in a Protective Sleeve with a Frame Card Holder.

NOTE:   If you wish to have me personalize a message in ink for a gift for someone else (or for you), please note such in your order confirmation during checkout via Paypal (Click "Add note to seller" during final payment confirmation); or, if that's too confusing for you, contact me here at the store site by clicking click "CONTACT", to the far left, drop me a little note!

Thank you, AW | dD

description:

Original 12.5" x 12.5" illustration produced for Miles Nielsen & The Rusted Hearts. They joined up with Wisconsin's veteran roots rockers, BoDeans for a summer 2012 ride across the prairie land and into Texas performing shows together.  What you see here is the only original illustration available that I produced for this engagement.  

Original technical ink illustration with metallic markers and a pink Sharpie on 12.5" x 12.5" 80# bright white Linen paper– and framed.

NOTE:  Multi-colored reproductions of this illustration are available as limited ed. poster prints at their shows if you're looking for something more affordable– and if any are left over come August 2012, they will be available at Miles & The Rusted Hearts' online shop:  www.rustedtrunk.com

name: Cory Chisel & Wandering Sons Vintage Collection
description:
1 Set Available of what's shown.

This rare personal collection of Cory Chisel related memorabilia includes 7 rare out of print prints, a guitar pic collectible handed out at the 2005 release of Chisel's "Darken Your Door" E.P., a set of photo flyers handed out for a 2007 show at Fox Cities Performing Arts Center in Appleton, WI, the band's business card used for booking, a guitar pic collectible handed out at the 2005 release of Chisel's "Darken Your Door" E.P., and very rare full length recordings, new/sealed, of Chisel's first band, "Breathing Machine", which includes 2 different press runs of "Alice Street and More", plus the hard to find release, "Out Of The Box".  This collection also includes first & second run pressings of Cory Chisel & The Wandering Sons' "Darken Your Door" E.P., and a copy of the full-length, "Little Bird".  Recordings are all sealed, mint; however, the first run pressing of "Alice Street and More" is a little beat up, still wrapped, from years of traveling and moving.

Free shipping & handling to winning buyer from North America / Everywhere else, fees will apply.

Questions, contact me at andy@andywhorehall.com

"I pledge allegiance to the almighty orange flag with a white dot of Derby | Reynolds, and to the YOU$A™ for which I stand, one nation indivisible, with liberty, speedboats, & metal panties for all. THAS RIGHT, IMA TALKIN TO YOU, SCUMBAGS IN BERGNER'S SUITS. GIT YO METAL PANTIES ON AND BOW DOWN TO YOUR NEW LORD AFTER YOU HONOR THY FLAG, THE ORANGE ONE WITH A WHITE DOT."
- Thom Derby, CEO & Lord Over All Scumbags in Bergner's Suits.

16" x 20" Mixed-Media Art Farm Containing 12.5" x 19" 2D Technical Ink Illustration featuring Grass, Cow, Delicious Pink Piggy, a Baby Sheep & a Native American, plus an Orange Monster Buck that Mr. Lippy & Mr. Derby spotted during hunting season, and let live. name: SOLD OUT - Hang Your Head Down, Boy
description:
A limited quantity of  (24) 12.5" x 19" archival ink prints are now available.  A series of a few dozen illustrations were produced for Cory Chisel and The Wandering Sons' "Little Bird" record, this was one of them that didn't make it past the first round of ideas due to too many pompous chefs in the kitchen who opted to put Cory's face on the cover for marketing reasons, not artistic reasons.  It worked, kudos to the marketeers. This is an illustration I always felt represented the record better than the final artwork (photos) selected.  Hang your head down, boy.

Available:
Limited Ed. 12.5" w x 19" h
Archival Ink on Eames Solar White Canvas
Qty: Only 24 Available
Signed & numbered
Expect 1-2 weeks for delivery

Thank you,

AW  |  dD

name: SOLD OUT - Bono's Ballad
description:
12.5 x 19" Technical Ink Illustration 
with Crayola Markers

I had a dream that Ireland's 2nd favorite son (next to James Joyce), Bono, sang to me at my funeral; but that was the last part of the dream.  The first part of the dream involved sleeping peacefully on top of a skyscraper.  

I don't know how I died in the dream, so that Bono could wake me up at my own funeral, but it was ethereal, beautiful. 

Waking up from the dream that morning was bullshit; because for the first time in my life, I enjoyed the sound of Bono's voice and wanted to return to the dream, but couldn't.
